name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Pivotal Tracker
description: This is a repository of pivotal tracker APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Pivotal Tracker
apis.description: Pivotal Tracker is the agile project management tool of choice for developers around the world for real-time collaboration around a shared, prioritized backlog.
